phasing_details.phase_detail: When are the building works expected to commence?:

description: Conversion of an existing 4 persons small HMO (C4) into 6 person HMO (C4); including rear roof extension to main roof slope; roof extension to rear outrigger; and installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
subdivision_of_building: First Floor, Second Floor and Loft Floor
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 181aLMR -PL -00 (Site and Block Plan); 181aLMR -PL -01 (Existing and Proposed Site Plan); 181aLMR -PL -02 (Existing Ground Floor - Unchanged); 181aLMR -PL -03 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 181aLMR -PL -04 (Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plan); 181aLMR -PL -05 (Existing and Proposed Loft Floor Plan); 181aLMR -PL -06 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plan); 181aLMR -PL -07 (Existing and Proposed Front Elevation); 181aLMR -PL -08 (Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation); 181aLMR -PL -10 (Proposed Left Elevation); 181aLMR -PL -12 (Proposed Right Elevation); 181aLMR -PL -14 (Proposed Section A-A).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
